availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Lucinda Floyd McGaughey Burnett (Shelby County, Kentucky )

body.p: Shelby County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Daughter of Levi Floyd. Married to Thomas McGaughey in Shelby County, Kentucky, in January 1829. Mother of Martha S. McGaughey and M. McGaughey. Married to Henry Burnett in Shelby County on December 16, 1847. Stepmother of A. Burnett, M. Burnett, W. Burnett, and B. Burnett. Mother of Henry T. Burnett and Bettie M. Burnett. Resident of Shelby County in 1850. Resident of Shelby County in 1853.
